title: Samy Bengio - Wikipedia
snippet: Samy Bengio (born 1965) is a Canadian computer scientist working as senior director of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Research at Apple. Bengio obtained his Ph.D. in Computer Science in 1993 with a thesis titled Optimization of a Parametric Learning Rule for Neural Networks from ...

title: Samy Bengio
snippet: Samy Bengio (PhD in computer science, University of Montreal, 1993) was a research scientist at Google from 2007 to 2021. Prior to that, he was senior researcher in statistical machine learning at IDIAP Research Institute, where he supervised ...
